Entries.Robin: ...So this is it, huh? This is how it all ends. Lost one husband, then another... what's left for me?$s#$e#I can hardly stand to be here. Please, leave me be...$s.
Entries.Maru: Dad... he left so much work unfinished.$s#$b#I guess... I'll have to finish it for him. It's the least I could do.$s
Entries.Sebastian: ...$s#$b#This is... about the most uncomfortable I've ever felt in my entire life.$s#$b#Just... how do I even feel, man? What am I supposed to *say*? Am I supposed to lie and say I liked him? Would that be more disrespectful than being honest?$s#$b#...I don't know. I just don't know.$s
